forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 65, with temperatures falling to around 63 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 18 to 23 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 56. West southwest wind 13 to 21 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph.

weather_report:
The afternoon unfolds in Downtown San Francisco, greeted by a sun that bathes the city in a mild glow, though whispers of falling temperatures remind all to stay attuned to the breeze. The air is alive with a robust west-southwest wind, rushing past at a swift pace, stirring leaves and tangling hair as it weaves through the streets. While the sky might be mostly sunny, a veil persists, hinting at the ever-present dance with the marine layer, which lingers nearby, waiting for nightfall to envelop the city in a cooler embrace.

As twilight approaches, the clouds begin to gather, painting the horizon in shades of gray, teasing hints of what the evening might hold. The chill settles into the evening air, with the forecast calling for temperatures to dip into the cozy fifties, suggesting layers may be the wisest choice for any evening adventure. Perhaps a stroll along the Embarcadero would serve as the perfect antidote to a bustling week, or an intimate gathering at a local café could warm both heart and spirit as the city lights flicker to life. Embrace the day with a light jacket and an open mind, ready to seize the fleeting moments that this beautiful city offers.
